author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In lands afar o'er oceans wide,
Where falcons of the skies do glide,
A C919, proud and strong,
A dragon to the skies belongs.

With earth once ruled by golden coin,
Europe findeth now a choice:
A king of old shall hold his sway,
As interest rates in dance do play.

Of Antioch, a city near,
Where whispers dark do rise mid-air,
Half the guards with tongues so foul,
Engage in words that hearts do scowl.

feedItems.title: China's C919 Takes Maiden Commercial Flight---and First Bite From Boeing
feedItems.description: Despite backing from top leaders and a ready-made market for its planes, manufacturer Comac faces a steep path to success.

feedItems.title: Dollar Is Still King in Europe and Swaying Interest Rates
feedItems.description: The Federal Reserve’s interest-rate increases affect Europe’s economy as much as—or even more than—they do the U.S.

feedItems.title: In a Small California City, Nearly Half the Police Included in Racist Text Threads
feedItems.description: For at least four years, officers in Antioch called Black residents racial slurs, bragged about beating suspects and joked about violating people’s rights.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Oh, Holmes of Theranos fame, dost face
An earthly trial, shackled and confined,
Within a prison's walls, ye seek God's grace
And inmates' friendship rare, perchance to find.

In Turkey's realm, where Erdogan doth reign,
The people vote, for power hangs in wait,
Their voices speak, mid chaos and great strain,
In hopes to shape their lands and seal their fate.

Hark! Plush companions for the babes, now sought,
By weary souls, who covet soft embrace,
As Jellycats, with human mien distort,
Bring solace to the heart, and laughter's trace.

feedItems.title: Inmates Await Theranos Founder: 'I Want to Be Her Friend'
feedItems.description: Elizabeth Holmes is expected to begin an 11-year sentence at a Bryan, Texas, prison camp on Tuesday.

feedItems.title: Turkey Votes in Runoff After Erdogan Takes First-Round Lead
feedItems.description: Millions of people are heading to the polls on Sunday in a presidential runoff election that could cement President Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s grip on power and his country’s influence in the war in Ukraine, the Middle East and NATO.

feedItems.title: Why Adults Are Snapping Up a Stuffed Toy Originally for Babies
feedItems.description: Jellycats’ quirky designs and humanlike characteristics seem suited to home décor and self-care.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In wild fields where rabbits play,
Two vying factions meet halfway,
For to mend the pierced ceil'ng high,
Ere the hounds of the House descry.

Of tether'd spending, work and wall,
A deal is struck, agreeing all,
That goat and snail walk arm in arm,
And sheltered be from storm and harm.

Ne'er ventured here such noble feasts,
Of tipping tips in gas-lit wastes,
As gallant troubadour rides hence,
To sing anew 'midst goat and hens.

feedItems.title: Biden, McCarthy Strike Debt-Ceiling Deal 'in Principle'
feedItems.description: Republicans and Democrats will now race to pass the agreement to raise the nation’s $31.4 trillion borrowing limit for two years through both chambers of Congress, with a House vote expected in the coming week.

feedItems.title: What's in the Debt-Ceiling Deal
feedItems.description: The agreement in principle between President Biden and House Republicans includes spending caps, work requirements and permitting.

feedItems.title: More »
feedItems.description: "This is a gas station off I-80 in the middle of nowhere, not a fancy restaurant in New York." Tipping is out of control.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In Texan halls, where swords divide,
A house of lords, a great divide,
Ken Paxton felled, by kin and kind,
Their voices joined, in fate’s design.

Of birth and blood, the tale unfolds,
American kin, shall bear no more,
Their cradles bare, the earth unshackled,
As fewer babes grace these hallowed shores.

A hall once grand, the stones did roll,
In Montauk's land, he built anew,
Jann Wenner's dream, of counsel sought,
Now minimalist, retreats to shore.

feedItems.title: Texas House Votes to Impeach Ken Paxton
feedItems.description: Fellow Republicans joined in the move to oust the state’s top lawyer.

feedItems.title: More »
feedItems.description: Why Americans are having fewer babies

feedItems.title: The House That 'Rolling Stone' Built
feedItems.description: ‘Rolling Stone’ co-founder Jann Wenner has forgone his maximalist past, building a casually minimalist family retreat in Montauk, New York.
